questions.question: What is the exam schedule?
questions.answer:
For the classes below 3rd there is no exam, just normal test, 
 for the classes above the exams are divided into four parts, 1st in July of 20 marks, 2nd in September of 80 marks, 3rd in January of 20marks, and the final paper in February of 80marks.

questions.question: curriculum in the school?
questions.answer:
The curriculum in the School is designed to provide a comprehensive education to students.
 It includes subjects such as Mathematics, English, Science, Social Studies, and Language Arts.
 Additionally, students have access to various elective courses to explore their interests and talents.

questions.question: What is the uniform schedule of the school
questions.answer:
The school has a fixed uniform schedule: 
Monday: All students are required to wear the complete school uniform, including the specified uniform shirt, pants/skirt, tie, blazer/jumper, and appropriate shoes.
Tuesday: Same as Monday, complete school uniform is mandatory.
Wednesday: House uniform
Thursday: Same as Monday, complete school uniform is mandatory.
Friday: White uniform.
